type: Tutorial Step - You Will Get Lost!

definition.text: You may find it hard to grasp the interface as it doesn't become intuitive until you master a few concepts. Please, be patient!

paragraphs.text: The right way to start is to embrace the following idea:
Superalgos is built on a different paradigm, optimized to handle and digest extreme complexity. It takes time to make sense of it, so please, open your mind and let go of all preconceived notions.
There's a lot to learn. Tutorials are packed with information introduced in the order we believe makes the most sense for most people. Please, revisit tutorials until you master all the basics.
